benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to saving throws against ongoing effects and conditions with the necrotic keyword.
flavor: You might have served a necromancer in your youth, perhaps as an apprentice or possibly as guard or servant. Proximity to your masterâ€™s corruption left a mark on you. Did your experience alter how you see undead? Is necromancy a path you might seek or is it an abomination to be fought and destroyed? How does the mark manifest on you? Are you pale? Do you suffer from a disfiguring condition, or are you unhinged?Possible Minor Quests: You might have born witness to appalling acts of wickedness, and if so, you might seek redemption, fighting the darkness to atone for your past. name: Touched By Darkness
